original_text: They made for the ephod attaching shoulder pieces, joined to it at its two edges.
korean_text: 에봇에는 어깨받이를 만들어 그 두 끝에 달아 서로 연결되게 하고

sentences.original_text: They made for the ephod attaching shoulder pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 에봇을 위해 어깨 조각들을 만들었는데

sentences.original_text: joined to it at its two edges.
